sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>116</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/116</github_url> <message>Do you know when ServiceNow introduced 'im_idea_core' table as parent of 'idea' (similar to cmdb parent of cmbi_ci) table. how they mapped some of the data to new parent table? It seems like there an API to copy a field's data from one table to another in a single line.  ```javascript Syntax: GlideDBUtil.copyFromOldToNew(targetFieldToCopy,sourceTableName,targetTableName,sourceFieldToCopyFrom) Ex: GlideDBUtil.copyFromOldToNew('idea_description', 'idea', 'im_idea_core', 'business_case'); ```  This copies business_case column data from idea to idea_description column in im_idea_core</message> <number>TIL0001122</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-05-06 05:59:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e9c401292f53c55051dad5f62799b69c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-09 15:19:47</sys_updated_on> <title>Copy field data to another field</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
